data.description:
***Immerse Yourself in Red Matter—A VR Masterpiece of Sci-Fi Suspense!***

Step into the role of Agent Epsilon, an astronaut of the Atlantic Union dispatched to a deserted Volgravian base on Rhea, Saturn's mysterious moon. Amidst a dystopian Cold War, your mission is to investigate a clandestine research project that could alter the fate of humanity.

🚀 ***Groundbreaking Virtual Reality***: Experience VR like never before with visuals that redefine immersion. Every detail, from the stark brutalist architecture to surreal landscapes, is meticulously crafted to captivate your senses.

🧩 ***Intuitive and Engaging Puzzles***: Challenge your intellect with puzzles seamlessly integrated into the narrative. Use advanced tools to decode encrypted messages, manipulate alien technology, and unlock the secrets buried within the facility.

🎭 ***A Story That Grips You***: Delve into a rich narrative filled with intrigue and unexpected twists. As reality blurs, question everything you see and uncover a truth that is as unsettling as it is compelling.

🌌 ***A Unique VR Experience***: More than just a game, Red Matter pushes the boundaries of virtual reality. Its unparalleled attention to detail and gripping narrative make it a must-play title that stands out in the VR landscape.

Prepare to question your perception of reality. Equip your high-tech gear and embark on a mission where nothing is as it seems. The secrets of Rhea await—will you dare to uncover them?

changelog.change_log:
· Revamped controls: Now with proper smooth locomotion for a more immersive experience
· Dynamic Resolution: Implemented for Quest 2 and Quest 3 to maximize the resolution based on system load
· Expanded Localization: Now supporting Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Brazilian Portuguese, and Simplified Chinese
· Achievements: 20 achievements added for you to track your progress—jump in and see how many you can complete! 
· Red Matter 2 cross-promotion

-Graphics enhancements for Quest 2:
  ·Added anisotropic filtering to textures
  ·Increased resolution of several textures
  ·Game resolution increased
  ·Enabled Dynamic Fixed Foveated Rendering
  ·Lowered maximum Fixed Foveated Rendering level
-Several French localization fixes
